subject: Critical Thinking
title: The Art of Good Enough: When to Stop Deciding
description: A quick win: understand The Art of Good Enough: When to Stop Deciding.

hook.text: You compare 47 restaurants, read 200 reviews, & spend an hour choosing dinner. Was the extra research worth it?

buildup.text: Satisficing vs. maximizing: satisficers pick the first option that meets their criteria. Maximizers exhaust every option.

twist.text: The time & energy spent finding the 'best' option is itself a cost.

punchline.text: Good enough is often great enough. Perfection is the enemy of done.

quiz.question: What did Schwartz discover about maximizers vs. satisficers?
options: Maximizers make objectively better choices but are less happy with them
